"As you heard, within the Resol Forest,": "there are readings of a large-scale DOLLS signature."
"As it matches our records, we believe this to be the appearance of Nex Aelio."
"Yes. THAT Nex Aelio."
"Did he just say \"Nex Aelio\"? What's that? \"Nex Aelio\"?"
"The last time we encountered Nex Aelio was around 10 years ago."
"It wrought massive devastation across the entire Aelio region, on a scale that had never been seen before."
"Just recently, Bruder's party was sent to scout the Resol Forest, when suddenly they ceased all transmissions."
"What?! Bruder's...?!"
"To make matters worse, this was around the time Nex Aelio appeared, followed by increased DOLLS activity in every region."
"This means that ARKS will have to be stretched thin in order to deal with every situation."
"The mission to send support into Resol Forest, in particular, will be considerably dangerous."
"On that note, are any of you willing to volunteer?"
"We'll go."
"You've just came back from a mission, didn't you? Will you be okay?"
"Yeah."
"...If it's the three of us, right?"
"I see. I appreciate it."
"Nex Aelio is incredibly powerful. Avoid battles where you can, and focus on finding Bruder's team."
"Understood."
"Any other volunteers?"
"Thank you, everyone. Good luck out there."
